TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the name of the associated property is displayed with parentheses in the Properties window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A> value of `true` indicates to the Properties window that the associated property should be displayed with parentheses around its name. The Properties window displays a property with parentheses around its name near the top of the list in alphabetical mode, or near the top of its category if the Properties window is in categorize mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool needParenthesis) cil managed

Docs.param: if the name should be enclosed in parentheses; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified value to indicate whether the attribute is displayed with parentheses.
Initializes a new instance of the class with a default value that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object o) cil managed

Docs.summary: Compares the specified object to this object and tests for equality.

Docs.returns: The hash code for the object the attribute belongs to.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsDefaultAttribute() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
Docs.returns: if the current value of the attribute is the default value of the attribute; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the Properties window displays the name of the property in parentheses in the Properties window.
Docs.value: if the property is displayed with parentheses; otherwise, .
